attributes.action: abolish tax and duty on alcohol one bank holliday a year and allow landlords to charge whatever they want for that day.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For years the people of this country have been exploited and robbed blind with taxes, duty and the rest on the sale of alcohol.

So what i propose, is that we keep these but one day a year preferably a bank holiday we should have a tax haven day on the sale of alcohol products served in pubs and clubs and on this day it should be down to the landlord to control the price. 

This would be thank you from the government every british person deserves for paying through the nose to support this country.
